#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
bool comp(pair<long long,long long> a,pair<long long,long long> b)
{
	if(a.first>b.first) return true;
	else if(a.first==b.first) 
	{
		if(a.second < b.second) return true;
	}
	return false;
}
int main()
{
	long long i,n,k,s,m,q;
	scanf("%lld", &n);
	pair<long long,long long> vec[n];
	for(i=0;i<n;i++) 
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld", &s,&m); 	
		vec[i] = make_pair(s*m,i);
	}
	sort(vec,vec+n,comp);
	scanf("%lld", &q);
	while(q--) 
	{
		scanf("%lld", &k);
		printf("%lld\n", vec[k-1].second+1);
	}
	return 0;
}
